Codes for “Local wind regime induced by giant linear dunes”#

This page contains the documentation of the codes used in the paper:

Local wind regime induced by giant linear dunes: comparison of ERA5-Land re-analysis with surface measurements.

Note

  • the corresponding Github repository is https://github.com/Cgadal/GiantDunes

  • the corresponding data are available here:

test: matplotlib.pyplot.scatter
